meanings.definition: The world or community of athletes.
meanings.sent1: In jockdom, everyone cheers for each other during the games.
meanings.sent2: She felt proud to be part of the jockdom at her school.
meanings.sent3: The jockdom organized a fun charity run to raise funds.
meanings.sent4: To him, jockdom was like a big supportive family.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of jockdom was evident in the camaraderie among the players.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics associated with athletes.
meanings.sent1: His determination and hard work exemplified true jockdom.
meanings.sent2: She admired the discipline and focus that came with jockdom.
meanings.sent3: The jockdom in him came out when he pushed himself to the limit.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, his jockdom shone brightly during the competition.
meanings.sent5: The essence of jockdom was evident in his dedication to training.
